message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us started. My initial offer for the product is $1200000.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for me at this time.  I'm very interested in this product, but I'm looking to pay closer to $1100000.  Let's see if we can work something out.

Bob, I understand that $1100000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $1150000. I think this is a fair price that balances both our interests.
